Reviews.Title: New to replace old
Reviews.Author: cheerymamma
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to have for when my current Samsung (the same) I have been using for over a year decides to kick it. So far no sign of that and after fitting with a gel sleeve? It has taken quite a beating and still works as great as first day of use. I have used several different data services, tethered, bluetoothed, mobile apped....used it to do online coursework in a pinch. No app issues ever and the quality picture, sound and video expected of Samsung delivered. I wish I could buy two more. Im keeping this one as back up in case anything ever does happen to the original. So far, not a worry, not an issue. Aces on this phone alll around.

Reviews.Title: I recommend it to you
Reviews.Author: MEYLYN007
Reviews.Content: The product was new, good quality.  My friend like it much.  It has a nice colour and good quality.  It was unlocked and could be used in other countries.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, No Complaints
Reviews.Author: Mojofosb15
Reviews.Content: I ordered a Samsung Galaxy Mini International Unlocked phone.  It arrived in perfect shape, unlocked as promised, unused, etc.  Just as I expected!

Reviews.Title: Awusome
Reviews.Author: Star
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my dad . He likes it very much.wonderful price and work. Just doesn't have manual at all . I should ask  saumsung to email me one in PDF .

Reviews.Title: This little phone was awesome!
Reviews.Author: Amarain
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for a 3 week trip to scandinavia and I gotta say, it was definitely worth the buy. Note to self, the original language was in Russian, so use the internets to figure out the keystrokes to change it to your language preference.I usually use a Galaxy S3, so this was a great mini version. I used it primarily for messaging, maps and the internets. The pictures look pretty bad on the screen, but if you upload or transfer them to a computer, they look just fine.It's battery life was really great, and it worked well with the different sim cards I had to buy. I definitely recommend this little phone as a back up or as a phone to use while traveling internationally, I do not recommend it if you are looking for a day to day smart phone, the screen is just a little too small for that type of use.

Reviews.Title: simple and nice overseas
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A gift for my wife (she does not like cellphones). Very simple to use device, with many features. Great overseas where we just change to local SIM cards. Great battery endurance. Finally my wife is using a cellphone... Thanks Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Got an used unit
Reviews.Author: rayhan
Reviews.Content: I returned my phone because it was an used one and it had a defect. What upset me more was it was given quite a "makeover" - sealed box, handset beautifully wrapped in plastic giving me the feel of a new one, accessories in pristine condition. Once I inserted my SIM (I had to go through the hassle of cutting my SIM into "micro") the flaws started coming out. I had the Facebook, email and what's app configured of a Spanish lady inside the phone with pictures and all *Yikes!* The scroll key was totally unresponsive. Other than that the phone was ok.

160MB storage, 384MB RAM, hot-swappable microSD card slot (up to 16GB)Camera: 3 megapixel fixed focus camera
Wi-Fi b/g/n, Bluetooth 2.1 with A2DP, standard microUSB port, GPS receiver with A-GPS, 3.5mm audio jack
Package contents: Handset, battery, Manual, charger, USB cord, and 2GB micro SD with adapter (outlet adaptor is provided for customers in North America)
